roleset.name: express two or more genes simultaneously

example.name: coexpressed proteins
example.text: Co-expression of RasV12 and wild-type Aurora-A in WT cells increase the activity of RalA of RasV12 (Figure 3A, lane 5, 3.7 fold).

example.name: coexpressed genes
example.text: In vertebrates, the cardiac actin gene is coexpressed with the skeletal actin gene in both the developing somites and the heart of the early embryo.
example.arg: the cardiac actin gene is coexpressed with the skeletal actin gene
both the developing somites and the heart of the early embryo.
